# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variables is the following:

* Short name: `oth_fam`
* Variable label: `Has other (living) family members (e.g. parents, siblings, in-laws, etc.)`
* Domain: `Social environment`
* Value type: `cathegorical`
* Categories:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | No
1        | Yes


* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

# Data process

## Cuba
### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variables

The study-specific variable elected to be harmonised is:

* Name: `r_inlaw`
* Label: `number of coresident sons and daughters-in-law`

* Name: `r_othrel`
* Label: `number of coresident other relatives`

* Name: `r_sibs`
* Label: `number of coresident siblings`


* Description: 
```{r assign1 cuba}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline',variables=list('r_inlaw','r_othrel','r_sibs'), missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local1 cuba}
t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam')

vari <-  t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
#Continuous_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam, aes(x=factor(r_inlaw))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("number of coresident sons and daughters-in-law") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <-  t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
#Continuous_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam, aes(x=factor(r_othrel))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("number of coresident other relatives") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <-  t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
#Continuous_summary(var = t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam, aes(x=factor(r_sibs))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("number of coresident siblings") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any > 0 then 1`
* `if all then 0`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 cuba, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$id)

t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw), "NA='-999'")
t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs), "NA='-999'")
t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam)[1]){
  if( t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw[i] >0 | t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs[i] >0 | t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel[i] >0 ){
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam[i] = 1 }
  else if( t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw[i] == 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs[i] == 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel[i] == 0 ){
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam[i] = 0 }
}
  
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam <- labelled(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1 cuba}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3]) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
#Categorical_summary(var = t1066_ds_cuba_w1$oth_fam, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(x=factor(oth_fam))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Has other family members?") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation1 cuba}

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any > 0 then 1`
* `if all then 0`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 UP, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_UP_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$id)

t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw), "NA='-999'")
t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs), "NA='-999'")
t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam)[1]){
  if( t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw[i] >0 | t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs[i] >0 | t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel[i] >0 ){
    t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam[i] = 1 }
  else if( t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_inlaw[i] == 0 & t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_sibs[i] == 0 & t1066_UP_w1_oth_fam$r_othrel[i] == 0 ){
    t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam[i] = 0 }
}
  
t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam <- labelled(t1066_ds_UP_w1$oth_fam, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```
